rows.label: qev012403_MSG0001
rows.name:
Between the crash and the welcome party,
I figured my number was up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012403_MSG0002
rows.name:
But then you arrived! Nice to know we
haven't been forsaken entirely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012403_JNK0010
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev012403_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell them Roscoe asked you to help.

rows.label: qev012403_JNK0020
rows.name: Check

rows.label: qev012403_SEL0021
rows.name: Inquire about the cargo.

rows.label: qev012403_MSG0003
rows.name:
Seriously? Wow! Next thing you know,
it'll be snowing in hell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012403_MSG0004
rows.name:
Er, sorry. Roscoe's just infamously stingy.
I never thought he'd shell out for help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012403_MSG0005
rows.name:
But hey, I'm glad to be wrong. And even
more glad he sent someone like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012403_MSG0006
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012403_MSG0007
rows.name: Heh. You're all business, aren't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012403_MSG0008
rows.name: Not that I don't respect a pragmatist...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012403_MSG0009
rows.name:
Anyway, let's get down to it. Yes, the cargo is
perfectly safe. As are we, for what that's worth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012403_MSG0010
rows.name:
That said...I'm afraid we're not out of the fire
just yet. We need to repair the helicopter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012403_MSG0011
rows.name:
Ciska's shoddy piloting and maintenance work
caused the crash, but I suppose pointing fingers
isn't going to help anyone now...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012403_MSG0012
rows.name:
Anyway, I hate to lean on you for everything,
but could you possibly procure two new anhydrous
radiators and a spherical EM motor?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012403_MSG0013
rows.name:
I need to stay here to guard the helicopter,
and Ciska's performing "maintenance" inside.
We're basically pinned down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012403_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev012403_SEL0031
rows.name: Agree to obtain the parts.

rows.label: qev012403_JNK0040
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev012403_SEL0041
rows.name:
Express concern about whether
they can really defend themselves.

rows.label: qev012403_MSG0014
rows.name: I appreciate it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012403_MSG0015
rows.name:
Heh... I admit I panicked and hid like a little
baby last time, but I've got my composure
back now. We're good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012403_MSG0016
rows.name:
I'll keep the helicopter and its cargo safe.
And I suppose Ciska, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012403_MSG0017
rows.name:
You can concentrate on gathering those parts
for the repairs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012403_MSG0018
rows.name:
Those anhydrous radiators are pretty common in
Primordiaâ€”you may even have some on hand already.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012403_MSG0019
rows.name:
As for the spherical electromagnetic motor,
cross Elephant's Trunk to the north and look for
the Great Nail.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev012403_MSG0020
rows.name:
A Curator I know once mentioned finding one
in the crags northeast of those stones.[ST:wait ]
